document.full_text: vincent lecavalier scored his second goal of the game 6:19 into overtime, and the tampa bay lightning beat the top-seeded washington capitals for a 2-0 lead in the eastern conference semifinals.
document.title: lightning 3, capitals 2 (ot): lecavalier leads lightning past in overtime
lines_and_colors: vincent lecavalier scored his second goal of the game 6:19 into overtime, and the tampa bay lightning beat the top-seeded washington capitals for a 2-0 lead in the eastern conference semifinals.
